MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeData (int minimumRows, out bool isSampleData);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeData(int32 minimumRows, bool isSampleData) cil managed

Docs.param: The minimum number of rows to return.
to indicate that the returned data is sample data; to indicate that the returned data is live data.
Docs.summary: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the provided number of rows and returns a value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
Docs.returns: A object containing data to display at design time.
Docs.value: A object containing data to display at design time.

Docs.summary: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
